titleStmt.title: By the Protector. A declaration of His Highnes with the advice of the Council, in order to the securing the peace of this Commonwealth.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field, Printers to His Highness,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Whitehall this 24. of November, 1655.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
